body_html: I have changed the title of this to reflect that. I think this is an excellent feature request. The constraints are that we cannot change existing behavior, but adding a maintain_dtype=False arg and prominent documentation would be good.

body: I have changed the title of this to reflect that. I think this is an excellent feature request. The constraints are that we cannot change existing behavior, but adding a `maintain_dtype=False` arg and prominent documentation would be good.
